sentences.en: Disseminating indecent photographs on the internet a distasteful act.
sentences.cn: 在因特网上发布不雅照片是卑劣的行径.

sentences.en: He left the party with indecent haste.
sentences.cn: 他很不礼貌地匆匆离开宴会.

sentences.en: He married again with almost indecent haste.
sentences.cn: 他再婚了,匆忙得几乎有失体面.

sentences.en: He was found guilty of possessing indecent photographs.
sentences.cn: 他被判藏有淫秽照片罪。

sentences.en: Her appetite for gossip is absolutely indecent.
sentences.cn: 她爱搬弄是非,极不道德.

sentences.en: In the mouth of the clergyman, they were false, indecent.
sentences.cn: 通过牧师之口, 它们就变成虚假和粗鄙的了.

sentences.en: It is indecent to say that.
sentences.cn: 说那样的话是很不礼貌的.

sentences.en: It was indecent of him to do that.
It was indecent of them to talk business at the funeral.
sentences.cn: 他们在葬礼上谈生意经,真不像话.

sentences.en: It'should not matter that they thought her behaviour indecent and uncivilized.
sentences.cn: 即使人们认为她行为不检,缺乏教养,那也无足挂齿.

sentences.en: Much instruction you'll get out of an indecent French novel.
sentences.cn: 你会从一本下流的法国小说里获得许多教益.

sentences.en: She started a new relationship with almost indecent haste.
sentences.cn: 她又开始谈情说爱,速度快得让人几乎不能接受.

sentences.en: That skirt of hers is positively indecent.
sentences.cn: 她的那条裙子太暴露了。

sentences.en: That skirt of hers is positively indecent.
The opposition says the legislation was drafted with indecent haste.
sentences.cn: 反对人士认为该法律的起草太过草率。

sentences.en: You can’t go out in that dress – it’s positively indecent!
sentences.cn: 你不能穿那种衣服外出——太不雅观了！

sentences.en: You're still harboring indecent thoughts about me.

words.tran_cn: 猥亵地；下流地；不堪入目地
下流的；不礼貌的；不得体的

trans.tran_cn: 粗鄙的，猥亵的，不适当的，不合适的，不礼貌的，不得体的
trans.tran_en: something that is indecent is shocking and offensive, usually because it involves sex or shows parts of the body that are usually covered
